column1: lieketseng ha utsebe kefupereng ka moo
eitse ha kefihla ka moo kafumana useurobehile
u lethetsi hampe wena tsebo keatseba
tsena tse pela poleiti di tharo
eo e pela ditlhare uesiya kae
tse pela skaftini le botlolo ya fishoil
hleso ake utlise dintho tsena tsaka
boausi teboho mohla keresemese banebajella lebekereng lena
hee bonang ka ha mme lieketseng ho jwang
ketlanka wane omonyane wa ausi mantso
le wena lieketseng ake utlose dikobo tsena
